metadata.feature_description: Verifies that the AccountSettings module installs correctly and registers with the DNN/Evoq framework

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify module appears in installed extensions list

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Extensions in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Extensions page loads with list of installed extensions
steps.actual: Extensions page loaded successfully showing Installed Extensions tab

steps.expected: List shows only PersonaBar extensions including Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings
steps.actual: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings is visible in the list with version 10.1.1

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify assembly is deployed to bin folder

steps.expected: Assembly file exists in the bin folder
DNN Core version 8.0.0 or higher is installed
steps.actual: Evoq 10.1.1 is running which satisfies the CoreVersion 08.00.00 dependency

steps.expected: Dnn.PersonaBar.UI version 01.00.00 or higher is installed
steps.actual: Dnn.PersonaBar.UI.dll found in bin folder, Dnn.PersonaBar.Extensions shows version 10.1.1 in extensions list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Azure compatibility flag is set correctly

steps.expected: azureCompatible element should be set to true

steps.action: Check module registration in PersonaBar menu
steps.expected: Module should appear as menu item in PersonaBar
steps.actual: nav_Accounts menu item visible in PersonaBar left navigation (identifier: Evoq.Accounts)

steps.action: Verify module loads without errors in Extensions list
steps.expected: Module displays correctly without error indicators
steps.actual: Module displays with icon, name, version (10.1.1), and edit/delete actions available

observations: The nav_Accounts menu item displays the raw resource key 'nav_Accounts' instead of 'Accounts' - this may indicate a localization resource file is missing or not properly loaded
Module manifest defines default permissions for: Administrators, Content Managers, Content Editors, Community Manager
